Utils¶

This package contains various modules for helpful functions used throughout project.

Construct Microenvironments¶

This module contains functions for constructing microenvironment images from segmentation masks.

utils.construct_microenvironments.construct_partitioned_microenvironments_from_contours(contours, img, r=256)¶

Construct Microenvironments from Segmented Cell Events by partitioning the segmentation mask into images of size rxr

Parameters:
  • contours – Spatial information of segmented cell events
  • img – Original segmentation mask
  • r – Dimensions of microenvironments
Returns:

Vector containing partitioned images

MIBI Reader¶

This module contains functions for reading the MIBI data.

utils.mibi_reader.concatenate_multiple_points(points_upper_bound=48)¶

Concatenate all the point data

Parameters:points_upper_bound – Point number upper bound
Returns:Marker data and segmentation mask as numpy arrays
utils.mibi_reader.read(point_name='Point15', plot=True, plot_markers=False, remove_noise=False, segmentation_type='allvessels')¶

Read the MIBI data from a single point

Parameters:
  • point_name – Name of point to read
  • plot – Should show a preview of the segmentation mask?
  • plot_markers – Should output a description of the marker data?
  • remove_noise – Should perform noise removal?
  • segmentation_type – Type of segmentation mask i.e ‘allvessels’ etc.
Returns:

Marker data and segmentation mask as numpy arrays

TIFF Reader¶

This module contains functions for reading the TIFF Files.

utils.tiff_reader.read(path, describe=False)¶

Read a Tiff file

Parameters:
  • path – Path to file
  • describe – Should describe file?
Returns:

MIBI Microenvironment Identification
